long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brexit Means Breakfast Is a Chrome extension which hijacks Brexit discussions on the web by changing the topic to the most important meal of the day â€“ so you never have to read about Brexit again.
